title: The Zero-Minute Workout (Rebroadcast)
description: There is strong evidence that exercise is wildly beneficial. There is even stronger evidence that most people hate to exercise. So if a pill could mimic the effects of working out, why wouldn’t we want to take it?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
